title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.8 - Liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6171.8 - Liability

State Regulations

Nothing contained in this Part shall impose liability upon
the commissioner of the Division of Criminal Justice Services, the Crime

Victims Board or the State for death, injury or loss incurred by eligible
witnesses or their families while such persons are receiving program service
through the witness protection program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6171.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
